entry.tran: 棱纹针织法;罗纹针织法
entry.def: Ribbing is a method of knitting that makes a raised pattern of parallel lines. You use ribbing, for example, round the edge of sweaters so that the material can stretch without losing its shape.

means.word_mean: 2. the act of harassing someone playfully or maliciously (especially by ridicule); provoking someone with persistent annoyances;
